My AmeriCorps Service

August 16, 2018

Last year, I joined the AmeriCorps and had a chance to serve at the Braddock Youth Project site in Braddock, PA. It’s a program that has hires youth and teaches them workplace skills and so much more. During the school year, they offer three different teams: Gardening, Mentoring, and Media and in the summer, they also offer a Ceramics and Book Distribution team.

Read more

Wild West

May 20, 2018

This past April, I got to climb at three different areas: Alabama Hills, Red Rocks, and Joshua Tree. The rocks at each area was very different from each other, but equally amazing in their own right. I think I could get used to this kind of desert life.

Ireland Roadtrip

December 4, 2017

Earlier this year, a friend and I planned a trip to Ireland. We wanted to get the most out of the country and thought that the best way to do that was to rent a car and drive around the country. The big cities on our list were Dublin, Cork, Galway, and Belfast, with plenty of stops in between.
